flavorText:
"When you cannot rely on your sources, trust your own senses. When you cannot trust those, you must follow your instincts."
—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian chieftain
name: Misinformation
originalText: Put up to three target cards from an opponent's graveyard on top of his or her library in any order.

rulings.text: You target the cards, but not the opponent.
You don’t need to show the opponent what order you put the cards on top of their library.

text: Put up to three target cards from an opponent's graveyard on top of their library in any order.
